tool_description: Tracks and evaluates ongoing vendor performance across active contracts, monitoring delivery, quality, and compliance metrics to maintain qualification status.

monitoring_period.description: Performance monitoring timeframe: monthly, quarterly, annually

error_messages: Registration not found: The provided registration_id does not exist in the system.
No active contracts: Vendor has no active contracts to monitor performance.
Invalid monitoring period: Use one of [monthly, quarterly, annually].
Performance data unavailable: Unable to retrieve performance metrics for the specified period.
usage: Provide registration_id to monitor vendor performance. Optionally specify monitoring_period for evaluation timeframe. The tool analyzes contract performance and generates ratings.

overall_rating.description: Overall performance rating (excellent, good, satisfactory, poor)

compliance_incidents.description: Number of compliance issues during monitoring period
